mapper.select: select no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_hit from NOTICE order by notice_date desc offset #{start} rows fetch first #{end} rows only
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content},notice_date=#{notice_date}, notice_hit=#{notice_hit} where no=#{no}
update notice set notice_hit=notice_hit+1 where no=#{no}
